page.title: 04The Dig at Church Close
page.content: {The Headland-H/pool By Andrew Milburn In{Church Close,}opposite {St.Hilda's {Church}there is archaeological dig I went into the display cabin and there were pictures and information about all the different 'digs' in H/Pool.The archaeologists have found foundations of{Medieval Houses.}One of these,could have been a merchant's house.A merchant's house had 2 rooms on the ground floor.One of the rooms might have been the living roomand the back room,which had a large oven,may have been the kitchen.This part of the 'dig' is now finished and the builders are preparing the land for new development.In the cabin there was a visitor's book.{Visitors come from all {over the world}to visit this site.Many visitors come from{Europe,U.S.A.}and some even come from{Australia. }
